entry.title: Introducing Project ReIgnite
entry.summary: Introducing our upcoming educational PCB range!
entry.content:
Struggling to Get Started with Soldering and Electronics?​

Ever wanted to learn soldering and electronics but didn't know where to start? Tired of low-quality kits with little to no instructions? Project ReIgnite is here to help!

Many beginner kits lack documentation, and their quality is questionable—often just cheap resells from AliExpress. Worse, they throw you straight into complex circuits with no guidance. That’s where Project ReIgnite comes in.

What is Project ReIgnite?​

We are designing a kit to take you from a complete beginner to someone confident in both SMD and through-hole soldering, while also learning the basics of electronics. Our structured, step-by-step approach ensures you learn valuable skills without feeling overwhelmed.

How It Works​

Our ReIgnite Kit consists of a staged set of linked boards, each introducing a new soldering method or electronics concept. By the end of the kit, you'll have completed multiple modules that not only teach you essential skills but also provide you with working circuits you can build upon!
